page.title: 13FAMILY SURVEY
page.content: MY MUM WAS BORN ON 24.5.46.IN {PLAISTOW,EAST LONDON.}HER HOUSE WAS A VICTORIAN STYLE HOUSE IT HAD EIGHT ROOMS WITH A CELLAR,NO BATHROOM,AN OUTSIDE LOO,BACK GARDEN AND A FRONT GARDEN WITH HEDGE ROUND IT.ALSO THERE WAS A WALL ENCLOSED WITH RAILINGS WHICH WERE TAKEN AWAY IN THE WAR TO MAKE{AMMUNITIONS}.THIS HOUSE WAS BUILT AT THE TURN OF CENTURY.ALSO IT HAD A FIREPLACE IN EVERY ROOM INCLUDING THE BEDROOMS. MY DAD WAS BORN IN{WALTHAM CROSS}IN JANUARY 1945.BECAUSE IT WAS AT THE END OF THE WAR HIS FIRST HOME WAS A PREFAB.IN 1960 HE GOT HIS FIRST JOB AS AN{APPRENTICE TAILOR}IN SAVILLE ROW,LONDON.LATER HE BECAME A QUALIFIED TAILOR AND WORKED FOR HIMSELF IN THE WEST END OF LONDON.LATER HE LEFT TAILORING AND WENT TO WORK IN THE DOCKS IN LONDON AND THEN IN TILBURY.
